question: Profile and improve SceneSystem usage in 변형된 Godot 아키텍처 applications.
answer:
## Changes

### Improvements

- [#63](https://github.com/godotengine/godot/pull/63): Improvements to the SceneSystem. 
- [#74](https://github.com/godotengine/godot/pull/74): Improve SceneSystem performance and usability.
- [#82](https://github.com/godotengine/godot/pull/82): Improve loading times and performance of SceneSystem.
- [#84](https://github.com/godotengine/godot/pull/84): Improve SceneSystem performance and memory usage.
- [#91](https://github.com/godotengine/godot/pull/91): Optimize SceneSystem for better performance.
- [#93](https://github.com/godotengine/godot/pull/93): Improve SceneSystem performance and usability by caching some operations.
- [#96](https://github.com/godotengine/godot/pull/96): Improve SceneSystem performance by reducing memory usage.
- [#104](https://github.com/godotengine/godot/pull/104): Improve SceneSystem performance with caching
